resp = client.indices.analyze(
    tokenizer="whitespace",
    filter=[
        "lowercase",
        {
            "type": "stop",
            "stopwords": [
                "a",
                "is",
                "this"
            ]
        }
    ],
    text="this is a test",
)
print(resp)
